amendment.description: Amendment increases funds for the Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS program by $2 million and reduces funds for the Chief Information Officer by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for the salaries and expenses for the Department of Housing and Urban Development by $2 million and increase the funds available for Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS Program by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
